entities.description: Receipt of substance use treatment for alcohol use in the past year.
Use of alcohol, including various treatment scenarios such as inpatient treatment, outpatient treatment, and jail for alcohol use.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance use treatment for alcohol use in the past year.
Specifies the type of substance use treatment received or needed.
Classification of the respondent as needing substance use treatment in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had an unmet need for substance use treatment due to cost or other reasons.

relationships.description: Indicates the specific type of substance use treatment received or needed by the respondent.
Classifies the respondent as needing substance use treatment in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had an unmet need for substance use treatment due to cost or other reasons.
Indicates whether the respondent received substance use treatment for alcohol use in the past year.
Specifies the type of treatment received for alcohol use, including inpatient, outpatient, and jail.
